scripts.graph:deploy:testnets: yarn graph:deploy:ropsten && yarn graph:deploy:goerli && yarn graph:deploy:rinkeby
scripts.graph:compile:local: rm -rf generated/local && mkdir generated/local && yarn graph:prepare:local && graph codegen --output-dir generated/local generated/local/subgraph.yaml && graph build generated/local/subgraph.yaml --output-dir generated/local/build
scripts.graph:compile:local:lite: yarn graph:prepare:local && graph codegen --output-dir generated/local generated/local/subgraph.yaml && graph build generated/local/subgraph.yaml --output-dir generated/local/build
scripts.graph:compile:ropsten: rm -rf generated/ropsten && mkdir generated/ropsten && yarn graph:prepare:ropsten && graph codegen --output-dir generated/ropsten generated/ropsten/subgraph.yaml && graph build generated/ropsten/subgraph.yaml --output-dir generated/ropsten/build
scripts.graph:deploy:ropsten: yarn graph:compile:ropsten &&  graph auth https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ f77cde46f12940e59dcc273e17f23590 && graph deploy   --debug --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ nuggxyz/nuggftv1-ropsten  generated/ropsten/subgraph.yaml
